revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Sealed Chamber |image = [[File:Sealed Chamber.png|270px]] |caption = A map of Sealed Chamber. |tokens = 36,000 |location = North of Route 134. }} '''Sealed Chamber''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 500,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || colspan=2 rowspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Tentacool.png|40px]] Tentacool |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Regirock.png|40px]] Regirock || rowspan=3|<center>4,500,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=3|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Regice.png|40px]] Regice |- | [[File:Registeel.png|40px]] Registeel |- |}
==Items==

<tab name="Debuff"> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
